content.title: Volt MX App
content.body:
1. Connect your mobile to your computer using a USB cable.
    For Android devices, make sure you use USB to Transfer Files.
  2. Launch the Volt MX App on your mobile.
  3. Select the USB tab.
  4. On successful connection, Iris on your computer shows a success prompt.
    At the same time, the USB icon turns green on your Volt MX App.
